p.k: Canadian-Italian mezzo-soprano Emily D'Angelo (1994) performs 'Smanie implacabili' from W. A. Mozart's opera Cosi fan tutte, 'Dopo notte, atra e funesta' from G. F. Handel's opera Ariodante, and 'Die Nachtigall', 'Traumgekrönt', and 'Sommertage' from Alban Berg's songs Sieben frühe Lieder, during the semi-finals of the Concours musical international de Montréal, 2018.
p.d: Canadian-Italian mezzo-soprano Emily D'Angelo (1994) performs 'Smanie implacabili' from W. A. Mozart's opera Cosi fan tutte, 'Dopo notte, atra e funesta' from G. F. Handel's opera Ariodante, and 'Die Nachtigall', 'Traumgekrönt', and 'Sommertage' from Alban Berg's songs Sieben frühe Lieder, during the semi-finals of the Concours musical international de Montréal, 2018.
